body_html:
Turns out, I had a wrong PYTHONPATH taking the first place, so it failed to find the correct module path. Here, I had this in the first place:

PYTHONPATH="${PYTHONPATH}:/home/pilotwarela0/Development/tensorflow"

The solution was to clear out this incorrect PYTHONPATH, then add the correct path again to the first place with this:

PYTHONPATH="${PYTHONPATH}:/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/"
export PYTHONPATH

Make sure to check your path with this: echo $PYTHONPATH

Make sure to check your path with this: echo $PYTHONPATH
body:
Turns out, I had a wrong PYTHONPATH taking the first place, so it failed to find the correct module path. Here, I had this in the first place:

PYTHONPATH="${PYTHONPATH}:/home/pilotwarela0/Development/tensorflow"

The solution was to clear out this incorrect PYTHONPATH, then add the correct path again to the first place with this:

PYTHONPATH="${PYTHONPATH}:/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/"
export PYTHONPATH

Make sure to check your path with this: echo $PYTHONPATH
